document.full_text: china's largest social network, renren, filed for a u.s. initial public offering to raise up to $573.1 million, the first of a clutch of facebook clones hoping to boost their profile with an american listing.
document.title: chinese facebook, renren, shoots for u.s. ipo
lines_and_colors: china's largest social network, renren, filed for a u.s. initial public offering to raise up to $573.1 million, the first of a clutch of facebook clones hoping to boost their profile with an american listing.
